mapper.select: SELECT KH_USER_PROFILE.U_RATE, KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ICON, KH_USER.U_ID, KH_USER.U_NICK, KH_PLAYER.PL_IP, KH_ROOM.RM_ID, KH_ROOM.RM_HOST FROM KH_USER INNER JOIN KH_USER_PROFILE ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_PLAYER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_PLAYER.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_ROOM ON KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_LAST_RID AND KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_PLAYER.RM_ID INNER JOIN KH_USER_INNER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_INNER.U_ID WHERE KH_USER.U_ID = #{uid} AND KH_USER_INNER.U_CONNECT > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.PL_IS_IN > 0

SELECT KH_USER_PROFILE.U_RATE, KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ICON, KH_USER.U_ID, KH_USER.U_NICK, KH_PLAYER.PL_IP, KH_ROOM.RM_ID, KH_ROOM.RM_HOST FROM KH_USER INNER JOIN KH_USER_PROFILE ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_PLAYER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_PLAYER.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_ROOM ON KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_LAST_RID AND KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_PLAYER.RM_ID INNER JOIN KH_USER_INNER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_INNER.U_ID WHERE KH_USER.U_ID <> 0 AND KH_USER_INNER.U_CONNECT > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.PL_IS_IN > 0

SELECT KH_PLAYER.U_ID, KH_USER_INNER.U_WS_ID, KH_USER.U_NICK FROM KH_USER_INNER INNER JOIN KH_USER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_INNER.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_PLAYER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_PLAYER.U_ID WHERE KH_USER_INNER.U_WS_ID IS NOT NULL AND KH_USER_INNER.U_CONNECT > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.PL_IS_IN > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.RM_ID = ( SELECT KH_PLAYER.RM_ID FROM KH_PLAYER INNER JOIN KH_USER_INNER ON KH_USER_INNER.U_ID = KH_PLAYER.U_ID WHERE KH_USER_INNER.U_WS_ID = #{sid} )

SELECT KH_USER_PROFILE.U_RATE, KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ICON, KH_USER.U_ID, KH_USER.U_NICK, KH_ROOM.RM_ID, KH_ROOM.RM_HOST FROM KH_USER INNER JOIN KH_USER_PROFILE ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_PLAYER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_PLAYER.U_ID INNER JOIN KH_ROOM ON KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_USER_PROFILE.U_LAST_RID AND KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_PLAYER.RM_ID INNER JOIN KH_USER_INNER ON KH_USER.U_ID = KH_USER_INNER.U_ID WHERE KH_ROOM.RM_ID = #{rid} AND KH_USER_INNER.U_CONNECT > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.PL_IS_IN > 0

SELECT COUNT(KH_PLAYER.U_ID) FROM KH_PLAYER INNER JOIN KH_ROOM ON KH_ROOM.RM_ID = KH_PLAYER.RM_ID WHERE KH_ROOM.RM_END IS NULL AND KH_PLAYER.U_ID = #{uid} AND KH_PLAYER.PL_IS_IN > 0 AND KH_PLAYER.RM_ID <> 0
